title: Lag spikes
body: I have been experiencing a lot of lag spikes since around the end of last month. After hovering at around 100 or so it will then drop back down to the normal - 49.

replies.body:
in aus, nz or somewhere else?

what provider are you with?
do you use a wired or wifi connection to the the router?
nz, with telstraclear (or vodafone, think they bought telsta) and use a wired connection
add that to your description mate, if a rito staff member can see that info they may have some answers for you.
